docs.title: What is the BoltRing?
docs.text: The BoltRing is the first Bitcoin DIY contactless payment ring. It uses NFC technology and the open-source Bolt Card system to bring the tap-to-pay experience to Bitcoin Lightning. You can operate the BoltRing with your self-sovereign Bitcoin Lightning setup or use it with a commercial service provider.

docs.title: BoltRing Quickstart
docs.text:
There are many options for setting up and using your BoltRing with varying tradeoffs. In this quickstart guide we show you a simple setup using LNBits with the Bolt Card extension as a service for your BoltRing. LNBits as a free open-source lightning account system. It operates on top of a lightning funding source such as LND.

Security Warning

In this guide we use a public demo installation of LNbits. This means you are trusting the operators of the service with guarding the satoshis you send to the LNBits wallet. Don´t be reckless and use it with caution and only for testing with small amounts.

docs.title: Step 0 - Prerequisites
docs.text:
• An existing Lightning Wallet that you can use to fund your LNBits account
  • An Android Mobile Phone with NFC support to provision your BoltRing
  • The NFC UID of your BoltRing (printed on the leaflet that came with your BoltRing)

I don´t have an Android Phone!

You will only need the Android Phone for the initial setup of your BoltRing. So you could borrow an Android Phone from a friend to do the setup. Another option for iPhone users is the CoinCorner Wallel. The CoinCorner App supports BoltCard setup on both Android and iPhone devices.

I don´t know the NFC UID of my BoltRing!

If you don´t know the UID of your BoltRing you can read it from the device at any time using an NFC enabled device and an app like NFC Tools. See NFC Tools for Android or NFC Tools for iPhone. The

docs.title: Step 1 - Create an LNBits Wallet
docs.text:
• Browse to https://legend.lnbits.com/
  • Type a memorable name for your wallet
  • Click "ADD A NEW WALLET"
  • Take note of you Wallet-URL

Secure your Wallet-URL

The LNBits wallet you created does not have a password protected login. The Wallet-URL shown in the browser after creating the wallet IS YOUR PASSWORD/LOGIN. So make a backup of the full Wallet-URL and keep it a secret.

docs.title: Step 2 - Fund your wallet
docs.text: Click the CREATE INVOICE button and send some satoshis to your LNbits wallet.

docs.title: Step 3 - Install Extension
docs.text:
Activate the LNBits Bolt Card Extension for your wallet as follows:

  • Click on Manage Extensions in the left menue
  • Click ENABLE on the Bolt Cards tile
  • Click OPEN or the new Bolt Cards item in the left menue

docs.title: Step 4 - Create Bolt Card Service
docs.text:
• Click the orange plus-button on the Bolt Cards Extension screen

On the card creation form:

  1. Select the wallet you created in Step 1
  2. Set a limit of satoshis per transaction (for example 50000)
  3. Set a limit of satoshis per day (for example 300000)
  4. Type a memorable name for your BoltRing
  5. Enter the NFC UID of your BoltRing
  6. Click Create Card
